title: Testimonial – SG
date: Posted on August 6th, 2019 by CHICKS & CHUCKS
content: Your generous gift made me cry tears of joy. May God bless you for all the work you do on a daily basis. SG

title: Testimonial – SZ
date: Posted on August 6th, 2019 by CHICKS & CHUCKS
content: Your organization has really touched our hearts. We are incredibly grateful for all that you do! SZ

title: Testimonial – AWW
date: Posted on July 24th, 2019 by CHICKS & CHUCKS
content:
I want to say Thank You. Your support is greatly appreciated. Since this journey
began earlier this year, finding additional survivors has been the best and positive
motivation that I needed to keep me going thru the chemo. AWW

title: Testimonial – NV
date: Posted on July 24th, 2019 by CHICKS & CHUCKS
content:
Can’t thank you enough for all the love and support you gave me. You are like
an angel sent to me at just the right time. NV

title: Testimonial – P.G.
content: Thanks for the blessing of my wig. I am truly thankful for everything you have done for me.
